LanguageData.AM_RelicDestructionOutcome.description: If the relic destruction ritual goes well (positive outcome) it will provide a mood bonus. A negative outcome will cause a mood penalty. In any case, the relic will be destroyed and all followers of the same ideo will get a permanent stat bonus.
LanguageData.AM_RelicDestructionOutcome.outcomeChance: The {0} was a bit boring, but we got rid of an obscene idol, and that will only make our beliefs stronger.
The {0} was entertaining. We got rid of an obscene idol, and that will only make our beliefs stronger.
LanguageData.AM_RelicDestructionOutcome.comps.0.label: room impressiveness
LanguageData.AM_RelicDestructionOutcome.comps.1.label: кількість учасників
LanguageData.AM_RelicDestructionOutcome.comps.2.label: {PAWN_labelShort}'s social impact
